text: Our clinic hours are Monday-Friday 8am-6pm, Saturday 9am-2pm. We are closed on Sundays and major holidays.
Late arrival policy: We have a 10-minute grace period. If you arrive more than 10 minutes late, your appointment may need to be rescheduled.
Cancellation policy: We require 24-hour advance notice for cancellations. Late cancellations may incur a $50 fee.
Patient parking is available in Lot B located behind the main building. The first 2 hours are free. Additional hours are $3 per hour.
We accept most major insurance plans including Blue Cross Blue Shield, Aetna, United Healthcare, Cigna, and Medicare.
New patients should arrive 15 minutes early to complete registration paperwork. Please bring your ID and insurance card.
Our office locations: Midtown (555 Main St), Downtown (123 Park Ave), and Uptown (789 Oak Blvd). All locations are wheelchair accessible.
Prescription refills can be requested through our patient portal or by calling 48 hours in advance. We do not provide refills during weekends.
We accept all forms of payment such as credit card, debit card, cash and cheques. We also provide installment payment based on amount
Appointments can be scheduled for Midtown, Downtown, or Uptown locations. Please specify your preferred time and location.
For pediatric patients, a parent or guardian must be present during the appointment.
Patients with allergies should inform the staff during check-in. Emergency allergy medication is available on-site.
Telehealth appointments are available for follow-up visits and consultations. Please request telehealth when booking.
